title: Loans; sale, pledge, or assignment
context: [ยง201H-108] Loans; sale, pledge, or assignment. (a) Subject to any agreements with the holders of its revenue bonds, the corporation may sell its loans at public or private sale at a price and upon terms and conditions as it determines. (b) Subject to any agreements with [the] holders of its revenue bonds, the corporation may pledge or assign its loans, other agreements, notes, or property to secure the loans or agreements.
